name: Color Combiner (aCatBox)
description:
Haro~ this is my very first game, I hope you all like this ^o^ GMTKJam is hard and I almost burn out. Hehe :..;

ADSW to move and RMB to Shoot.

You must use same color to defeat enemy. Each shoot you lost HP and you might become smaller and smoller. But don't worry, take the dot at the map center could gain you 1 HP. 

BTW: White color is very strong! They ignore the rule.

Thanks for playing my game ^o^
